original_text:
they pick saltwort and the leaves of bushes,
    and the roots of the broom tree for their food.
korean_text: 떨기나무 가운데에서 짠 나물을 꺾으며 대싸리 뿌리로 먹을 거리를 삼느니라

sentences.original_text: they pick saltwort and the leaves of bushes,
and the roots of the broom tree for their food.
sentences.korean_translation: 자기들의 식물을 위해 드라나무의 뿌리를 채취합니다.
